          <td id="LC54" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I. A SCANDAL IN BOHEMIA</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L55" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="55"></td>
          <td id="LC55" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L56" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="56"></td>
          <td id="LC56" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L57" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="57"></td>
          <td id="LC57" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L58" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="58"></td>
          <td id="LC58" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L59" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="59"></td>
          <td id="LC59" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To Sherlock Holmes she is always _the_ woman. I have seldom heard him</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L60" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="60"></td>
          <td id="LC60" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mention her under any other name. In his eyes she eclipses and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L61" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="61"></td>
          <td id="LC61" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">predominates the whole of her sex. It was not that he felt any emotion</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L62" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="62"></td>
          <td id="LC62" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">akin to love for Irene Adler. All emotions, and that one particularly,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L63" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="63"></td>
          <td id="LC63" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were abhorrent to his cold, precise but admirably balanced mind. He</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L64" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="64"></td>
          <td id="LC64" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was, I take it, the most perfect reasoning and observing machine that</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L65" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="65"></td>
          <td id="LC65" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the world has seen, but as a lover he would have placed himself in a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L66" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="66"></td>
          <td id="LC66" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">false position. He never spoke of the softer passions, save with a gibe</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L67" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="67"></td>
          <td id="LC67" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a sneer. They were admirable things for the observer—excellent for</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L68" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="68"></td>
          <td id="LC68" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drawing the veil from men’s motives and actions. But for the trained</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L69" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="69"></td>
          <td id="LC69" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reasoner to admit such intrusions into his own delicate and finely</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L70" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="70"></td>
          <td id="LC70" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">adjusted temperament was to introduce a distracting factor which might</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L71" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="71"></td>
          <td id="LC71" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">throw a doubt upon all his mental results. Grit in a sensitive</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L72" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="72"></td>
          <td id="LC72" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">instrument, or a crack in one of his own high-power lenses, would not</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L73" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="73"></td>
          <td id="LC73" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be more disturbing than a strong emotion in a nature such as his. And</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L74" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="74"></td>
          <td id="LC74" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet there was but one woman to him, and that woman was the late Irene</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L75" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="75"></td>
          <td id="LC75" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Adler, of dubious and questionable memory.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L76" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="76"></td>
          <td id="LC76" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L77" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="77"></td>
          <td id="LC77" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I had seen little of Holmes lately. My marriage had drifted us away</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L78" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="78"></td>
          <td id="LC78" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from each other. My own complete happiness, and the home-centred</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L79" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="79"></td>
          <td id="LC79" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interests which rise up around the man who first finds himself master</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L80" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="80"></td>
          <td id="LC80" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of his own establishment, were sufficient to absorb all my attention,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L81" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="81"></td>
          <td id="LC81" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">while Holmes, who loathed every form of society with his whole Bohemian</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L82" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="82"></td>
          <td id="LC82" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soul, remained in our lodgings in Baker Street, buried among his old</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L83" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="83"></td>
          <td id="LC83" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">books, and alternating from week to week between cocaine and ambition,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L84" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="84"></td>
          <td id="LC84" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the drowsiness of the drug, and the fierce energy of his own keen</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L85" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="85"></td>
          <td id="LC85" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nature. He was still, as ever, deeply attracted by the study of crime,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L86" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="86"></td>
          <td id="LC86" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and occupied his immense faculties and extraordinary powers of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L87" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="87"></td>
          <td id="LC87" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">observation in following out those clues, and clearing up those</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L88" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="88"></td>
          <td id="LC88" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mysteries which had been abandoned as hopeless by the official police.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L89" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="89"></td>
          <td id="LC89" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">From time to time I heard some vague account of his doings: of his</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L90" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="90"></td>
          <td id="LC90" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">summons to Odessa in the case of the Trepoff murder, of his clearing up</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L91" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="91"></td>
          <td id="LC91" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the singular tragedy of the Atkinson brothers at Trincomalee, and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L92" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="92"></td>
          <td id="LC92" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finally of the mission which he had accomplished so delicately and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L93" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="93"></td>
          <td id="LC93" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">successfully for the reigning family of Holland. Beyond these signs of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L94" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="94"></td>
          <td id="LC94" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his activity, however, which I merely shared with all the readers of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L95" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="95"></td>
          <td id="LC95" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the daily press, I knew little of my former friend and companion.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L96" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="96"></td>
          <td id="LC96" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L97" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="97"></td>
          <td id="LC97" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">One night—it was on the twentieth of March, 1888—I was returning from a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L98" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="98"></td>
          <td id="LC98" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">journey to a patient (for I had now returned to civil practice), when</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L99" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="99"></td>
          <td id="LC99" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my way led me through Baker Street. As I passed the well-remembered</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L100" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="100"></td>
          <td id="LC100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">door, which must always be associated in my mind with my wooing, and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L101" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="101"></td>
          <td id="LC101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with the dark incidents of the Study in Scarlet, I was seized with a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L102" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="102"></td>
          <td id="LC102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">keen desire to see Holmes again, and to know how he was employing his</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L103" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="103"></td>
          <td id="LC103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extraordinary powers. His rooms were brilliantly lit, and, even as I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L104" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="104"></td>
          <td id="LC104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked up, I saw his tall, spare figure pass twice in a dark silhouette</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L105" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="105"></td>
          <td id="LC105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">against the blind. He was pacing the room swiftly, eagerly, with his</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L106" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="106"></td>
          <td id="LC106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">head sunk upon his chest and his hands clasped behind him. To me, who</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L107" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="107"></td>
          <td id="LC107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">knew his every mood and habit, his attitude and manner told their own</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L108" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="108"></td>
          <td id="LC108" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">story. He was at work again. He had risen out of his drug-created</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L109" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="109"></td>
          <td id="LC109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreams and was hot upon the scent of some new problem. I rang the bell</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L193" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="193"></td>
          <td id="LC193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chamber then at that hour, and do not take it amiss if your visitor</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L194" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="194"></td>
          <td id="LC194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wear a mask.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L195" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="195"></td>
          <td id="LC195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L196" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="196"></td>
          <td id="LC196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“This is indeed a mystery,” I remarked. “What do you imagine that it</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L197" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="197"></td>
          <td id="LC197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">means?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L198" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="198"></td>
          <td id="LC198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L199" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="199"></td>
          <td id="LC199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I have no data yet. It is a capital mistake to theorise before one has</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L200" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="200"></td>
          <td id="LC200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">data. Insensibly one begins to twist facts to suit theories, instead of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L201" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="201"></td>
          <td id="LC201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">theories to suit facts. But the note itself. What do you deduce from</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L202" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="202"></td>
          <td id="LC202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L203" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="203"></td>
          <td id="LC203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L204" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="204"></td>
          <td id="LC204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I carefully examined the writing, and the paper upon which it was</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L205" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="205"></td>
          <td id="LC205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">written.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L206" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="206"></td>
          <td id="LC206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L207" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="207"></td>
          <td id="LC207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The man who wrote it was presumably well to do,” I remarked,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L208" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="208"></td>
          <td id="LC208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">endeavouring to imitate my companion’s processes. “Such paper could not</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L209" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="209"></td>
          <td id="LC209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be bought under half a crown a packet. It is peculiarly strong and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L210" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="210"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Peculiar—that is the very word,” said Holmes. “It is not an English</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">paper at all. Hold it up to the light.”</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L214" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="214"></td>
          <td id="LC214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L215" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="215"></td>
          <td id="LC215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I did so, and saw a large “E” with a small “g,” a “P,” and a large “G”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L216" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="216"></td>
          <td id="LC216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a small “t” woven into the texture of the paper.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L217" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="217"></td>
          <td id="LC217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L218" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="218"></td>
          <td id="LC218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What do you make of that?” asked Holmes.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L219" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="219"></td>
          <td id="LC219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L220" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="220"></td>
          <td id="LC220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The name of the maker, no doubt; or his monogram, rather.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L221" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="221"></td>
          <td id="LC221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L222" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="222"></td>
          <td id="LC222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Not at all. The ‘G’ with the small ‘t’ stands for ‘Gesellschaft,’</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L223" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="223"></td>
          <td id="LC223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which is the German for ‘Company.’ It is a customary contraction like</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L224" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="224"></td>
          <td id="LC224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our ‘Co.’ ‘P,’ of course, stands for ‘Papier.’ Now for the ‘Eg.’ Let us</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L225" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="225"></td>
          <td id="LC225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glance at our Continental Gazetteer.” He took down a heavy brown volume</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L226" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="226"></td>
          <td id="LC226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from his shelves. “Eglow, Eglonitz—here we are, Egria. It is in a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L227" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="227"></td>
          <td id="LC227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">German-speaking country—in Bohemia, not far from Carlsbad. ‘Remarkable</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L228" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="228"></td>
          <td id="LC228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as being the scene of the death of Wallenstein, and for its numerous</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L229" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="229"></td>
          <td id="LC229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glass-factories and paper-mills.’ Ha, ha, my boy, what do you make of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L230" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="230"></td>
          <td id="LC230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that?” His eyes sparkled, and he sent up a great blue triumphant cloud</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L231" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="231"></td>
          <td id="LC231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from his cigarette.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L232" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="232"></td>
          <td id="LC232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L233" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="233"></td>
          <td id="LC233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The paper was made in Bohemia,” I said.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L234" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="234"></td>
          <td id="LC234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L235" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="235"></td>
          <td id="LC235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Precisely. And the man who wrote the note is a German. Do you note the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L236" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="236"></td>
          <td id="LC236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peculiar construction of the sentence—‘This account of you we have from</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L237" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="237"></td>
          <td id="LC237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all quarters received.’ A Frenchman or Russian could not have written</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L238" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="238"></td>
          <td id="LC238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that. It is the German who is so uncourteous to his verbs. It only</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L239" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="239"></td>
          <td id="LC239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remains, therefore, to discover what is wanted by this German who</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L240" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="240"></td>
          <td id="LC240" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">writes upon Bohemian paper and prefers wearing a mask to showing his</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L241" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="241"></td>
          <td id="LC241" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face. And here he comes, if I am not mistaken, to resolve all our</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L242" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="242"></td>
          <td id="LC242" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doubts.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L243" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="243"></td>
          <td id="LC243" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L244" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="244"></td>
          <td id="LC244" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As he spoke there was the sharp sound of horses’ hoofs and grating</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L245" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="245"></td>
          <td id="LC245" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wheels against the curb, followed by a sharp pull at the bell. Holmes</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L246" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="246"></td>
          <td id="LC246" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whistled.</td>

          <td id="L247" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="247"></td>
          <td id="LC247" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“A pair, by the sound,” said he. “Yes,” he continued, glancing out of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L249" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="249"></td>
          <td id="LC249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the window. “A nice little brougham and a pair of beauties. A hundred</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L250" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="250"></td>
          <td id="LC250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and fifty guineas apiece. There’s money in this case, Watson, if there</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L251" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="251"></td>
          <td id="LC251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is nothing else.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L252" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="252"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L253" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="253"></td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L254" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="254"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Not a bit, Doctor. Stay where you are. I am lost without my Boswell.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L256" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="256"></td>
          <td id="LC256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And this promises to be interesting. It would be a pity to miss it.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L257" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="257"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L258" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="258"></td>
          <td id="LC258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But your client—”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L259" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="259"></td>
          <td id="LC259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L260" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="260"></td>
          <td id="LC260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Never mind him. I may want your help, and so may he. Here he comes.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L261" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="261"></td>
          <td id="LC261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sit down in that armchair, Doctor, and give us your best attention.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L262" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="262"></td>
          <td id="LC262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L263" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="263"></td>
          <td id="LC263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A slow and heavy step, which had been heard upon the stairs and in the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L264" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="264"></td>
          <td id="LC264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passage, paused immediately outside the door. Then there was a loud and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L265" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="265"></td>
          <td id="LC265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">authoritative tap.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L266" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="266"></td>
          <td id="LC266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L267" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="267"></td>
          <td id="LC267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Come in!” said Holmes.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L268" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="268"></td>
          <td id="LC268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L269" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="269"></td>
          <td id="LC269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A man entered who could hardly have been less than six feet six inches</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L270" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="270"></td>
          <td id="LC270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in height, with the chest and limbs of a Hercules. His dress was rich</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L271" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="271"></td>
          <td id="LC271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a richness which would, in England, be looked upon as akin to bad</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L272" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="272"></td>
          <td id="LC272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">taste. Heavy bands of astrakhan were slashed across the sleeves and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L273" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="273"></td>
          <td id="LC273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fronts of his double-breasted coat, while the deep blue cloak which was</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L274" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="274"></td>
          <td id="LC274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thrown over his shoulders was lined with flame-coloured silk and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L275" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="275"></td>
          <td id="LC275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">secured at the neck with a brooch which consisted of a single flaming</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L276" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="276"></td>

        </tr>

          <td id="LC356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Then, pray consult,” said Holmes, shutting his eyes once more.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L357" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="357"></td>
          <td id="LC357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L358" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="358"></td>
          <td id="LC358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The facts are briefly these: Some five years ago, during a lengthy</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

        </tr>

          <td id="L446" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="446"></td>
          <td id="LC446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am about to be married.”</td>

        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L522" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="522"></td>
          <td id="LC522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At three o’clock precisely I was at Baker Street, but Holmes had not</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L523" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="523"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L524" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="524"></td>
          <td id="LC524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shortly after eight o’clock in the morning. I sat down beside the fire,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L525" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="525"></td>
          <td id="LC525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, with the intention of awaiting him, however long he might be.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L526" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="526"></td>
          <td id="LC526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was already deeply interested in his inquiry, for, though it was</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L527" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="527"></td>
          <td id="LC527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surrounded by none of the grim and strange features which were</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L528" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="528"></td>
          <td id="LC528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">associated with the two crimes which I have already recorded, still,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L529" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="529"></td>
          <td id="LC529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the nature of the case and the exalted station of his client gave it a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L530" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="530"></td>
          <td id="LC530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">character of its own. Indeed, apart from the nature of the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L612" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="612"></td>

        <tr>

</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="LC687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Which are?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L688" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="688"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L689" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="689"></td>
          <td id="LC689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Some cold beef and a glass of beer,” he answered, ringing the bell. “I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L690" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="690"></td>
          <td id="LC690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have been too busy to think of food, and I am likely to be busier still</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L691" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="691"></td>
          <td id="LC691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this evening. By the way, Doctor, I shall want your co-operation.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L692" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="692"></td>
          <td id="LC692" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L693" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="693"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L772" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="772"></td>
          <td id="LC772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was a quarter past six when we left Baker Street, and it still</td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L774" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="774"></td>
          <td id="LC774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Avenue. It was already dusk, and the lamps were just being lighted as</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L775" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="775"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L776" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="776"></td>
          <td id="LC776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of its occupant. The house was just such as I had pictured it from</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L777" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="777"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L859" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="859"></td>
          <td id="LC859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L860" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="860"></td>
          <td id="LC860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He can’t lie in the street. May we bring him in, marm?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L861" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="861"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L862" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="862"></td>
          <td id="LC862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Surely. Bring him into the sitting-room. There is a comfortable sofa.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L863" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="863"></td>
          <td id="LC863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">This way, please!”</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L864" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="864"></td>
          <td id="LC864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L865" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="865"></td>
          <td id="LC865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Slowly and solemnly he was borne into Briony Lodge and laid out in the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L866" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="866"></td>
          <td id="LC866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">principal room, while I still observed the proceedings from my post by</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L867" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="867"></td>
          <td id="LC867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the window. The lamps had been lit, but the blinds had not been drawn,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L868" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="868"></td>
          <td id="LC868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so that I could see Holmes as he lay upon the couch. I do not know</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L869" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="869"></td>
          <td id="LC869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whether he was seized with compunction at that moment for the part he</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L870" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="870"></td>
          <td id="LC870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was playing, but I know that I never felt more heartily ashamed of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L871" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="871"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L872" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="872"></td>
          <td id="LC872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was conspiring, or the grace and kindliness with which she waited upon</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L873" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="873"></td>
          <td id="LC873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the injured man. And yet it would be the blackest treachery to Holmes</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L874" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="874"></td>
          <td id="LC874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to draw back now from the part which he had intrusted to me. I hardened</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L875" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="875"></td>

          <td id="L878" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="878"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L879" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="879"></td>

          <td id="L880" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="880"></td>

        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L888" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="888"></td>

</td>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L913" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="913"></td>
          <td id="LC913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Then, when the row broke out, I had a little moist red paint in the</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L914" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="914"></td>

          <td id="L915" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="915"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L916" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="916"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L917" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="917"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L918" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="918"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L919" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="919"></td>
          <td id="LC919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Then they carried me in. She was bound to have me in. What else could</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L920" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="920"></td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L922" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="922"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L923" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="923"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L924" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="924"></td>
          <td id="LC924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L925" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="925"></td>
          <td id="LC925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How did that help you?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L926" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="926"></td>
          <td id="LC926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L927" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="927"></td>
          <td id="LC927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It was all-important. When a woman thinks that her house is on fire,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L928" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="928"></td>
          <td id="LC928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her instinct is at once to rush to the thing which she values most. It</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L929" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="929"></td>
          <td id="LC929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is a perfectly overpowering impulse, and I have more than once taken</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L930" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="930"></td>
          <td id="LC930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">advantage of it. In the case of the Darlington Substitution Scandal it</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L931" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="931"></td>
          <td id="LC931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was of use to me, and also in the Arnsworth Castle business. A married</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L932" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="932"></td>
          <td id="LC932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woman grabs at her baby; an unmarried one reaches for her jewel-box.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L933" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="933"></td>
          <td id="LC933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Now it was clear to me that our lady of to-day had nothing in the house</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L934" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="934"></td>
          <td id="LC934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more precious to her than what we are in quest of. She would rush to</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L935" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="935"></td>
          <td id="LC935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">secure it. The alarm of fire was admirably done. The smoke and shouting</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L936" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="936"></td>
          <td id="LC936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were enough to shake nerves of steel. She responded beautifully. The</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L937" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="937"></td>
          <td id="LC937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">photograph is in a recess behind a sliding panel just above the right</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L938" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="938"></td>
          <td id="LC938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bell-pull. She was there in an instant, and I caught a glimpse of it as</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L939" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="939"></td>
          <td id="LC939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she half drew it out. When I cried out that it was a false alarm, she</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L940" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="940"></td>
          <td id="LC940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">replaced it, glanced at the rocket, rushed from the room, and I have</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L941" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="941"></td>
          <td id="LC941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not seen her since. I rose, and, making my excuses, escaped from the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L942" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="942"></td>
          <td id="LC942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house. I hesitated whether to attempt to secure the photograph at once;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L943" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="943"></td>
          <td id="LC943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but the coachman had come in, and as he was watching me narrowly, it</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L944" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="944"></td>
          <td id="LC944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed safer to wait. A little over-precipitance may ruin all.”</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L945" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="945"></td>

</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="LC946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And now?” I asked.</td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L948" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="948"></td>
          <td id="LC948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Our quest is practically finished. I shall call with the King</td>

          <td id="LC949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to-morrow, and with you, if you care to come with us. We will be shown</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L950" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="950"></td>
          <td id="LC950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the sitting-room to wait for the lady, but it is probable that</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L951" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="951"></td>
          <td id="LC951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when she comes she may find neither us nor the photograph. It might be</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L952" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="952"></td>
          <td id="LC952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a satisfaction to his Majesty to regain it with his own hands.”</td>

          <td id="L953" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="953"></td>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="LC958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">complete change in her life and habits. I must wire to the King without</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
        </tr>

        </tr>

          <td id="L1012" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1012"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1013" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1013"></td>
          <td id="LC1013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Because it would spare your Majesty all fear of future annoyance. If</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1014" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1014"></td>
          <td id="LC1014" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the lady loves her husband, she does not love your Majesty. If she does</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1015" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1015"></td>
          <td id="LC1015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not love your Majesty, there is no reason why she should interfere with</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1016" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1016"></td>
          <td id="LC1016" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your Majesty’s plan.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1017" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1017"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1018" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1018"></td>
          <td id="LC1018" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is true. And yet—! Well! I wish she had been of my own station!</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1019" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1019"></td>
          <td id="LC1019" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What a queen she would have made!” He relapsed into a moody silence,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1020" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1020"></td>
          <td id="LC1020" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which was not broken until we drew up in Serpentine Avenue.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1021" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1021"></td>
          <td id="LC1021" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1022" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1022"></td>
          <td id="LC1022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The door of Briony Lodge was open, and an elderly woman stood upon the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1023" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1023"></td>
          <td id="LC1023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">steps. She watched us with a sardonic eye as we stepped from the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1024" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1024"></td>
          <td id="LC1024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brougham.</td>

</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L1026" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1026"></td>
          <td id="LC1026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Mr. Sherlock Holmes, I believe?” said she.</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L1027" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1027"></td>

</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L1028" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1028"></td>
          <td id="LC1028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am Mr. Holmes,” answered my companion, looking at her with a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1029" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1029"></td>
          <td id="LC1029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">questioning and rather startled gaze.</td>

          <td id="L1030" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1030"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1031" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1031"></td>
          <td id="LC1031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Indeed! My mistress told me that you were likely to call. She left</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1032" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1032"></td>
          <td id="LC1032" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this morning with her husband by the 5:15 train from Charing Cross for</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1033" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1033"></td>
          <td id="LC1033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Continent.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1034" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1034"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1035" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1035"></td>
          <td id="LC1035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What!” Sherlock Holmes staggered back, white with chagrin and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1036" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1036"></td>
          <td id="LC1036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surprise. “Do you mean that she has left England?”</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L1037" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1037"></td>

</td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td id="L1039" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1039"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1040" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1040"></td>
          <td id="LC1040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And the papers?” asked the King hoarsely. “All is lost.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1041" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1041"></td>
          <td id="LC1041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1042" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1042"></td>
          <td id="LC1042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We shall see.” He pushed past the servant and rushed into the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1043" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1043"></td>
          <td id="LC1043" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drawing-room, followed by the King and myself. The furniture was</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1044" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1044"></td>
          <td id="LC1044" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scattered about in every direction, with dismantled shelves and open</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1045" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1045"></td>
          <td id="LC1045" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drawers, as if the lady had hurriedly ransacked them before her flight.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1046" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1046"></td>
          <td id="LC1046" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Holmes rushed at the bell-pull, tore back a small sliding shutter, and,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1047" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1047"></td>
          <td id="LC1047" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plunging in his hand, pulled out a photograph and a letter. The</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1048" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1048"></td>
          <td id="LC1048" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">photograph was of Irene Adler herself in evening dress, the letter was</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1049" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1049"></td>
          <td id="LC1049" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">superscribed to “Sherlock Holmes, Esq. To be left till called for.” My</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1050" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1050"></td>
          <td id="LC1050" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friend tore it open, and we all three read it together. It was dated at</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1051" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1051"></td>
          <td id="LC1051" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">midnight of the preceding night and ran in this way:</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1052" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1052"></td>
          <td id="LC1052" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1053" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1053"></td>
          <td id="LC1053" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    “MY DEAR MR. SHERLOCK HOLMES,—You really did it very well. You took</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1054" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1054"></td>
          <td id="LC1054" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    me in completely. Until after the alarm of fire, I had not a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1055" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1055"></td>
          <td id="LC1055" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    suspicion. But then, when I found how I had betrayed myself, I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1056" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1056"></td>
          <td id="LC1056" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    began to think. I had been warned against you months ago. I had</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1057" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1057"></td>
          <td id="LC1057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    been told that, if the King employed an agent, it would certainly</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1058" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1058"></td>
          <td id="LC1058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    be you. And your address had been given me. Yet, with all this, you</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1059" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1059"></td>
          <td id="LC1059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    made me reveal what you wanted to know. Even after I became</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1060" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1060"></td>
          <td id="LC1060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    suspicious, I found it hard to think evil of such a dear, kind old</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1061" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1061"></td>
          <td id="LC1061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    clergyman. But, you know, I have been trained as an actress myself.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1062" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1062"></td>
          <td id="LC1062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Male costume is nothing new to me. I often take advantage of the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1063" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1063"></td>
          <td id="LC1063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    freedom which it gives. I sent John, the coachman, to watch you,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1064" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1064"></td>
          <td id="LC1064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    ran upstairs, got into my walking clothes, as I call them, and came</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1065" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1065"></td>
          <td id="LC1065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    down just as you departed.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1066" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1066"></td>
          <td id="LC1066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1067" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1067"></td>
          <td id="LC1067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    “Well, I followed you to your door, and so made sure that I was</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1068" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1068"></td>
          <td id="LC1068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    really an object of interest to the celebrated Mr. Sherlock Holmes.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1069" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1069"></td>
          <td id="LC1069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    Then I, rather imprudently, wished you good-night, and started for</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1070" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1070"></td>
          <td id="LC1070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    the Temple to see my husband.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1071" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1071"></td>
          <td id="LC1071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1072" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1072"></td>
          <td id="LC1072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    “We both thought the best resource was flight, when pursued by so</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1073" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1073"></td>
          <td id="LC1073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    formidable an antagonist; so you will find the nest empty when you</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1074" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1074"></td>
          <td id="LC1074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    call to-morrow. As to the photograph, your client may rest in</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1075" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1075"></td>
          <td id="LC1075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    peace. I love and am loved by a better man than he. The King may do</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1076" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1076"></td>
          <td id="LC1076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    what he will without hindrance from one whom he has cruelly</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1077" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1077"></td>
          <td id="LC1077" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    wronged. I keep it only to safeguard myself, and to preserve a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1078" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1078"></td>
          <td id="LC1078" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    weapon which will always secure me from any steps which he might</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1079" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1079"></td>
          <td id="LC1079" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    take in the future. I leave a photograph which he might care to</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1080" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1080"></td>
          <td id="LC1080" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    possess; and I remain, dear Mr. Sherlock Holmes,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1081" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1081"></td>
          <td id="LC1081" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1082" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1082"></td>
          <td id="LC1082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1083" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1083"></td>
          <td id="LC1083" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">    “Very truly yours,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L1084" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="1084"></td>
