</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2416" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2416"></td>
          <td id="LC2416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He slept on the premises.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2417" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2417"></td>
          <td id="LC2417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2418" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2418"></td>
          <td id="LC2418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And you don’t know his address?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2419" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2419"></td>
          <td id="LC2419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2420" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2420"></td>
          <td id="LC2420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No—except that it was Leadenhall Street.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2421" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2421"></td>
          <td id="LC2421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2422" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2422"></td>
          <td id="LC2422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Where did you address your letters, then?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2423" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2423"></td>
          <td id="LC2423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2424" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2424"></td>
          <td id="LC2424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“To the Leadenhall Street Post Office, to be left till called for. He</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2425" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2425"></td>
          <td id="LC2425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">said that if they were sent to the office he would be chaffed by all</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2426" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2426"></td>
          <td id="LC2426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the other clerks about having letters from a lady, so I offered to</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2427" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2427"></td>
          <td id="LC2427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">typewrite them, like he did his, but he wouldn’t have that, for he said</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2428" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2428"></td>
          <td id="LC2428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that when I wrote them they seemed to come from me, but when they were</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2429" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2429"></td>
          <td id="LC2429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">typewritten he always felt that the machine had come between us. That</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2430" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2430"></td>
          <td id="LC2430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">will just show you how fond he was of me, Mr. Holmes, and the little</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2431" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2431"></td>
          <td id="LC2431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things that he would think of.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2432" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2432"></td>
          <td id="LC2432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2433" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2433"></td>
          <td id="LC2433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It was most suggestive,” said Holmes. “It has long been an axiom of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2434" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2434"></td>
          <td id="LC2434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mine that the little things are infinitely the most important. Can you</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2435" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2435"></td>
          <td id="LC2435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remember any other little things about Mr. Hosmer Angel?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2436" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2436"></td>
          <td id="LC2436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2437" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2437"></td>
          <td id="LC2437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He was a very shy man, Mr. Holmes. He would rather walk with me in the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2438" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2438"></td>
          <td id="LC2438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evening than in the daylight, for he said that he hated to be</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2439" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2439"></td>
          <td id="LC2439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">conspicuous. Very retiring and gentlemanly he was. Even his voice was</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2440" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2440"></td>
          <td id="LC2440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gentle. He’d had the quinsy and swollen glands when he was young, he</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2441" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2441"></td>
          <td id="LC2441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told me, and it had left him with a weak throat, and a hesitating,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2442" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2442"></td>
          <td id="LC2442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whispering fashion of speech. He was always well dressed, very neat and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2443" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2443"></td>
          <td id="LC2443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">plain, but his eyes were weak, just as mine are, and he wore tinted</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2444" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2444"></td>
          <td id="LC2444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glasses against the glare.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2445" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2445"></td>
          <td id="LC2445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2446" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2446"></td>
          <td id="LC2446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, and what happened when Mr. Windibank, your stepfather, returned</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2447" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2447"></td>
          <td id="LC2447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to France?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2448" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2448"></td>
          <td id="LC2448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2449" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2449"></td>
          <td id="LC2449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Mr. Hosmer Angel came to the house again and proposed that we should</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2450" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2450"></td>
          <td id="LC2450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">marry before father came back. He was in dreadful earnest and made me</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2451" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2451"></td>
          <td id="LC2451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swear, with my hands on the Testament, that whatever happened I would</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2452" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2452"></td>
          <td id="LC2452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">always be true to him. Mother said he was quite right to make me swear,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2453" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2453"></td>
          <td id="LC2453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that it was a sign of his passion. Mother was all in his favour</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2454" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2454"></td>
          <td id="LC2454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the first and was even fonder of him than I was. Then, when they</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2455" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2455"></td>
          <td id="LC2455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talked of marrying within the week, I began to ask about father; but</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2456" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2456"></td>
          <td id="LC2456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they both said never to mind about father, but just to tell him</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2457" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2457"></td>
          <td id="LC2457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afterwards, and mother said she would make it all right with him. I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2458" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2458"></td>
          <td id="LC2458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">didn’t quite like that, Mr. Holmes. It seemed funny that I should ask</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2459" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2459"></td>
          <td id="LC2459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his leave, as he was only a few years older than me; but I didn’t want</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2460" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2460"></td>
          <td id="LC2460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to do anything on the sly, so I wrote to father at Bordeaux, where the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2461" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2461"></td>
          <td id="LC2461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">company has its French offices, but the letter came back to me on the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2462" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2462"></td>
          <td id="LC2462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very morning of the wedding.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2463" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2463"></td>
          <td id="LC2463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2464" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2464"></td>
          <td id="LC2464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It missed him, then?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2465" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2465"></td>
          <td id="LC2465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2466" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2466"></td>
          <td id="LC2466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, sir; for he had started to England just before it arrived.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2467" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2467"></td>
          <td id="LC2467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2468" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2468"></td>
          <td id="LC2468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Ha! that was unfortunate. Your wedding was arranged, then, for the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2469" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2469"></td>
          <td id="LC2469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Friday. Was it to be in church?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2470" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2470"></td>
          <td id="LC2470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2471" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2471"></td>
          <td id="LC2471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, sir, but very quietly. It was to be at St. Saviour’s, near King’s</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2472" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2472"></td>
          <td id="LC2472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Cross, and we were to have breakfast afterwards at the St. Pancras</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2473" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2473"></td>
          <td id="LC2473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hotel. Hosmer came for us in a hansom, but as there were two of us he</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2474" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2474"></td>
          <td id="LC2474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">put us both into it and stepped himself into a four-wheeler, which</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2475" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2475"></td>
          <td id="LC2475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happened to be the only other cab in the street. We got to the church</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2476" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2476"></td>
          <td id="LC2476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first, and when the four-wheeler drove up we waited for him to step</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2477" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2477"></td>
          <td id="LC2477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out, but he never did, and when the cabman got down from the box and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2478" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2478"></td>
          <td id="LC2478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked there was no one there! The cabman said that he could not</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2479" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2479"></td>
          <td id="LC2479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imagine what had become of him, for he had seen him get in with his own</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2480" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2480"></td>
          <td id="LC2480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyes. That was last Friday, Mr. Holmes, and I have never seen or heard</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2481" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2481"></td>
          <td id="LC2481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything since then to throw any light upon what became of him.”</td>

</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="LC2483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It seems to me that you have been very shamefully treated,” said</td>

</td>

        <tr>

          <td id="LC2487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning he was saying to me that, whatever happened, I was to be true;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC2516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mine. And yet, what could have happened? And why could he not write?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2517" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2517"></td>
          <td id="LC2517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Oh, it drives me half-mad to think of it, and I can’t sleep a wink at</td>
        </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        </tr>

</td>

          <td id="LC2546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He travels for Westhouse &amp; Marbank, the great claret importers of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2547" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2547"></td>
          <td id="LC2547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Fenchurch Street.”</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2707" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2707"></td>
          <td id="LC2707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, that! I thought of the salt that I have been working upon. There</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2708" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2708"></td>

</td>

</td>

        </tr>

</td>

        </tr>

          <td id="L2779" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2779"></td>

</td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2782" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2782"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2784" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2784"></td>
          <td id="LC2784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, it won’t do—really it won’t,” said Holmes suavely. “There is no</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2785" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2785"></td>
          <td id="LC2785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">possible getting out of it, Mr. Windibank. It is quite too transparent,</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L2865" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2865"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2945" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2945"></td>
          <td id="LC2945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2946" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2946"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L2947" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="2947"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3020" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3020"></td>

        </tr>

          <td id="L3021" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3021"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3022" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3022"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3023" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3023"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3024" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3024"></td>
          <td id="LC3024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC3182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

          <td id="L3265" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3265"></td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L3344" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3344"></td>
          <td id="LC3344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is no time for me to hide anything. James and his father had many</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3345" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3345"></td>
          <td id="LC3345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disagreements about me. Mr. McCarthy was very anxious that there should</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3346" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3346"></td>
          <td id="LC3346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be a marriage between us. James and I have always loved each other as</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L3347" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3347"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3348" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3348"></td>
          <td id="LC3348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of life yet, and—and—well, he naturally did not wish to do anything</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3349" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3349"></td>

          <td id="L3350" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3350"></td>
          <td id="LC3350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them.”</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3410" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3410"></td>

        </tr>

        </tr>

        </tr>

          <td id="LC3413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The puny plot of the story was so thin, however, when compared to the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3414" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3414"></td>

        </tr>

          <td id="L3415" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3415"></td>
          <td id="LC3415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wander so continually from the action to the fact, that I at last flung</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3416" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3416"></td>
          <td id="LC3416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it across the room and gave myself up entirely to a consideration of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3417" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3417"></td>
          <td id="LC3417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the events of the day. Supposing that this unhappy young man’s story</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3418" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3418"></td>
          <td id="LC3418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were absolutely true, then what hellish thing, what absolutely</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3419" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3419"></td>
          <td id="LC3419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unforeseen and extraordinary calamity could have occurred between the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3420" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3420"></td>
          <td id="LC3420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time when he parted from his father, and the moment when, drawn back by</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3421" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3421"></td>
          <td id="LC3421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his screams, he rushed into the glade? It was something terrible and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3422" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3422"></td>
          <td id="LC3422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deadly. What could it be? Might not the nature of the injuries reveal</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3423" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3423"></td>
          <td id="LC3423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">something to my medical instincts? I rang the bell and called for the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3424" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3424"></td>
          <td id="LC3424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weekly county paper, which contained a verbatim account of the inquest.</td>
        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3504" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3504"></td>
          <td id="LC3504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3505" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3505"></td>
          <td id="LC3505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was no rain, as Holmes had foretold, and the morning broke bright</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3506" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3506"></td>
          <td id="LC3506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and cloudless. At nine o’clock Lestrade called for us with the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3507" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3507"></td>
          <td id="LC3507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carriage, and we set off for Hatherley Farm and the Boscombe Pool.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3508" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3508"></td>
          <td id="LC3508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3509" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3509"></td>
          <td id="LC3509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There is serious news this morning,” Lestrade observed. “It is said</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3510" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3510"></td>
          <td id="LC3510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that Mr. Turner, of the Hall, is so ill that his life is despaired of.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3511" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3511"></td>
          <td id="LC3511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3512" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3512"></td>
          <td id="LC3512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“An elderly man, I presume?” said Holmes.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3513" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3513"></td>
          <td id="LC3513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3514" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3514"></td>
          <td id="LC3514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“About sixty; but his constitution has been shattered by his life</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3515" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3515"></td>
          <td id="LC3515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">abroad, and he has been in failing health for some time. This business</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3516" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3516"></td>
          <td id="LC3516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">has had a very bad effect upon him. He was an old friend of McCarthy’s,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3517" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3517"></td>
          <td id="LC3517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and, I may add, a great benefactor to him, for I have learned that he</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3518" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3518"></td>
          <td id="LC3518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave him Hatherley Farm rent free.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3519" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3519"></td>
          <td id="LC3519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3520" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3520"></td>
          <td id="LC3520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Indeed! That is interesting,” said Holmes.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3521" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3521"></td>
          <td id="LC3521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3522" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3522"></td>
          <td id="LC3522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, yes! In a hundred other ways he has helped him. Everybody about</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3523" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3523"></td>
          <td id="LC3523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">here speaks of his kindness to him.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3524" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3524"></td>
          <td id="LC3524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3525" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3525"></td>
          <td id="LC3525" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Really! Does it not strike you as a little singular that this</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3526" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3526"></td>
          <td id="LC3526" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">McCarthy, who appears to have had little of his own, and to have been</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3527" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3527"></td>
          <td id="LC3527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">under such obligations to Turner, should still talk of marrying his son</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3528" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3528"></td>
          <td id="LC3528" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to Turner’s daughter, who is, presumably, heiress to the estate, and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3529" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3529"></td>
          <td id="LC3529" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that in such a very cocksure manner, as if it were merely a case of a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3530" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3530"></td>
          <td id="LC3530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">proposal and all else would follow? It is the more strange, since we</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3531" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3531"></td>
          <td id="LC3531" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know that Turner himself was averse to the idea. The daughter told us</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3532" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3532"></td>
          <td id="LC3532" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as much. Do you not deduce something from that?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3533" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3533"></td>
          <td id="LC3533" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3534" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3534"></td>
          <td id="LC3534" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We have got to the deductions and the inferences,” said Lestrade,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3535" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3535"></td>
          <td id="LC3535" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">winking at me. “I find it hard enough to tackle facts, Holmes, without</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3536" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3536"></td>
          <td id="LC3536" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flying away after theories and fancies.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3537" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3537"></td>
          <td id="LC3537" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3538" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3538"></td>
          <td id="LC3538" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You are right,” said Holmes demurely; “you do find it very hard to</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3539" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3539"></td>
          <td id="LC3539" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tackle the facts.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3540" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3540"></td>
          <td id="LC3540" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3541" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3541"></td>
          <td id="LC3541" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Anyhow, I have grasped one fact which you seem to find it difficult to</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3542" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3542"></td>
          <td id="LC3542" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">get hold of,” replied Lestrade with some warmth.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3543" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3543"></td>
          <td id="LC3543" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3544" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3544"></td>
          <td id="LC3544" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And that is—”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3545" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3545"></td>
          <td id="LC3545" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3546" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3546"></td>
          <td id="LC3546" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That McCarthy senior met his death from McCarthy junior and that all</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3547" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3547"></td>
          <td id="LC3547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">theories to the contrary are the merest moonshine.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3548" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3548"></td>
          <td id="LC3548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3549" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3549"></td>
          <td id="LC3549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, moonshine is a brighter thing than fog,” said Holmes, laughing.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3550" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3550"></td>
          <td id="LC3550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But I am very much mistaken if this is not Hatherley Farm upon the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3551" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3551"></td>
          <td id="LC3551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">left.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3552" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3552"></td>
          <td id="LC3552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3553" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3553"></td>
          <td id="LC3553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes, that is it.” It was a widespread, comfortable-looking building,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3554" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3554"></td>
          <td id="LC3554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two-storied, slate-roofed, with great yellow blotches of lichen upon</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3555" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3555"></td>
          <td id="LC3555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the grey walls. The drawn blinds and the smokeless chimneys, however,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3556" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3556"></td>
          <td id="LC3556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gave it a stricken look, as though the weight of this horror still lay</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3557" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3557"></td>
          <td id="LC3557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heavy upon it. We called at the door, when the maid, at Holmes’</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3558" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3558"></td>
          <td id="LC3558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">request, showed us the boots which her master wore at the time of his</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3559" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3559"></td>
          <td id="LC3559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">death, and also a pair of the son’s, though not the pair which he had</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3560" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3560"></td>
          <td id="LC3560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">then had. Having measured these very carefully from seven or eight</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3561" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3561"></td>
          <td id="LC3561" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">different points, Holmes desired to be led to the court-yard, from</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3562" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3562"></td>
          <td id="LC3562" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which we all followed the winding track which led to Boscombe Pool.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3563" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3563"></td>
          <td id="LC3563" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3564" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3564"></td>
          <td id="LC3564" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sherlock Holmes was transformed when he was hot upon such a scent as</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3565" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3565"></td>
          <td id="LC3565" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this. Men who had only known the quiet thinker and logician of Baker</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3566" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3566"></td>
          <td id="LC3566" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Street would have failed to recognise him. His face flushed and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3567" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3567"></td>
          <td id="LC3567" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">darkened. His brows were drawn into two hard black lines, while his</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3568" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3568"></td>
          <td id="LC3568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyes shone out from beneath them with a steely glitter. His face was</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3569" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3569"></td>
          <td id="LC3569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bent downward, his shoulders bowed, his lips compressed, and the veins</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3570" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3570"></td>
          <td id="LC3570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stood out like whipcord in his long, sinewy neck. His nostrils seemed</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3571" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3571"></td>
          <td id="LC3571" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to dilate with a purely animal lust for the chase, and his mind was so</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3572" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3572"></td>
          <td id="LC3572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absolutely concentrated upon the matter before him that a question or</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3573" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3573"></td>
          <td id="LC3573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remark fell unheeded upon his ears, or, at the most, only provoked a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3574" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3574"></td>
          <td id="LC3574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quick, impatient snarl in reply. Swiftly and silently he made his way</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3575" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3575"></td>
          <td id="LC3575" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">along the track which ran through the meadows, and so by way of the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3576" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3576"></td>
          <td id="LC3576" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woods to the Boscombe Pool. It was damp, marshy ground, as is all that</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3577" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3577"></td>
          <td id="LC3577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">district, and there were marks of many feet, both upon the path and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3578" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3578"></td>
          <td id="LC3578" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amid the short grass which bounded it on either side. Sometimes Holmes</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3579" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3579"></td>
          <td id="LC3579" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would hurry on, sometimes stop dead, and once he made quite a little</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3580" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3580"></td>
          <td id="LC3580" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">detour into the meadow. Lestrade and I walked behind him, the detective</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3581" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3581"></td>
          <td id="LC3581" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">indifferent and contemptuous, while I watched my friend with the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3582" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3582"></td>
          <td id="LC3582" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interest which sprang from the conviction that every one of his actions</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3583" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3583"></td>
          <td id="LC3583" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was directed towards a definite end.</td>

</td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3658" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3658"></td>
          <td id="LC3658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Is a tall man, left-handed, limps with the right leg, wears</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3659" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3659"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3660" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3660"></td>
          <td id="LC3660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a cigar-holder, and carries a blunt pen-knife in his pocket. There are</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3661" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3661"></td>
          <td id="LC3661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several other indications, but these may be enough to aid us in our</td>
        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

        <tr>
          <td id="L3825" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3825"></td>

</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L3826" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3826"></td>
          <td id="LC3826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And why did you wish to see me?” He looked across at my companion with</td>

</td>

          <td id="L3829" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3829"></td>

          <td id="L3830" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3830"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3861" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3861"></td>
          <td id="LC3861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It’s as well,” said the old man; “it’s a question whether I shall live</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3862" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3862"></td>
          <td id="LC3862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the Assizes, so it matters little to me, but I should wish to spare</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3863" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3863"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3864" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3864"></td>
          <td id="LC3864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been a long time in the acting, but will not take me long to tell.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3865" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3865"></td>
          <td id="LC3865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3866" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3866"></td>
          <td id="LC3866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You didn’t know this dead man, McCarthy. He was a devil incarnate. I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3867" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3867"></td>
          <td id="LC3867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tell you that. God keep you out of the clutches of such a man as he.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3868" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3868"></td>
          <td id="LC3868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His grip has been upon me these twenty years, and he has blasted my</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3869" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3869"></td>
          <td id="LC3869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">life. I’ll tell you first how I came to be in his power.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3870" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3870"></td>
          <td id="LC3870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3871" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3871"></td>
          <td id="LC3871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It was in the early ’60’s at the diggings. I was a young chap then,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3872" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3872"></td>
          <td id="LC3872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hot-blooded and reckless, ready to turn my hand at anything; I got</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3873" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3873"></td>
          <td id="LC3873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">among bad companions, took to drink, had no luck with my claim, took to</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3874" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3874"></td>
          <td id="LC3874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the bush, and in a word became what you would call over here a highway</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3875" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3875"></td>
          <td id="LC3875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">robber. There were six of us, and we had a wild, free life of it,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3876" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3876"></td>
          <td id="LC3876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sticking up a station from time to time, or stopping the wagons on the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3877" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3877"></td>
          <td id="LC3877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">road to the diggings. Black Jack of Ballarat was the name I went under,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3878" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3878"></td>
          <td id="LC3878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and our party is still remembered in the colony as the Ballarat Gang.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3879" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3879"></td>
          <td id="LC3879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3880" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3880"></td>
          <td id="LC3880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“One day a gold convoy came down from Ballarat to Melbourne, and we lay</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3881" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3881"></td>
          <td id="LC3881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in wait for it and attacked it. There were six troopers and six of us,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3882" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3882"></td>
          <td id="LC3882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">so it was a close thing, but we emptied four of their saddles at the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3883" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3883"></td>
          <td id="LC3883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first volley. Three of our boys were killed, however, before we got the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3884" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3884"></td>
          <td id="LC3884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swag. I put my pistol to the head of the wagon-driver, who was this</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3885" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3885"></td>
          <td id="LC3885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very man McCarthy. I wish to the Lord that I had shot him then, but I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3886" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3886"></td>
          <td id="LC3886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spared him, though I saw his wicked little eyes fixed on my face, as</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3887" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3887"></td>
          <td id="LC3887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">though to remember every feature. We got away with the gold, became</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3888" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3888"></td>
          <td id="LC3888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wealthy men, and made our way over to England without being suspected.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3889" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3889"></td>
          <td id="LC3889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There I parted from my old pals and determined to settle down to a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3890" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3890"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3891" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3891"></td>
          <td id="LC3891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the market, and I set myself to do a little good with my money, to</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3892" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3892"></td>
          <td id="LC3892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make up for the way in which I had earned it. I married, too, and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3893" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3893"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3894" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3894"></td>
          <td id="LC3894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">she was just a baby her wee hand seemed to lead me down the right path</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3895" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3895"></td>
          <td id="LC3895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as nothing else had ever done. In a word, I turned over a new leaf and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3896" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3896"></td>
          <td id="LC3896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">did my best to make up for the past. All was going well when McCarthy</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3897" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3897"></td>
          <td id="LC3897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">laid his grip upon me.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3898" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3898"></td>
          <td id="LC3898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3899" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3899"></td>
          <td id="LC3899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I had gone up to town about an investment, and I met him in Regent</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3900" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3900"></td>
          <td id="LC3900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Street with hardly a coat to his back or a boot to his foot.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3901" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3901"></td>
          <td id="LC3901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3902" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3902"></td>
          <td id="LC3902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Here we are, Jack,’ says he, touching me on the arm; ‘we’ll be as</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3903" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3903"></td>
          <td id="LC3903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good as a family to you. There’s two of us, me and my son, and you can</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3904" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3904"></td>
          <td id="LC3904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have the keeping of us. If you don’t—it’s a fine, law-abiding country</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3905" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3905"></td>
          <td id="LC3905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is England, and there’s always a policeman within hail.’</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3906" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3906"></td>
          <td id="LC3906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3907" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3907"></td>
          <td id="LC3907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, down they came to the west country, there was no shaking them</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3908" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3908"></td>
          <td id="LC3908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off, and there they have lived rent free on my best land ever since.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3909" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3909"></td>
          <td id="LC3909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was no rest for me, no peace, no forgetfulness; turn where I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3910" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3910"></td>
          <td id="LC3910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would, there was his cunning, grinning face at my elbow. It grew worse</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3911" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3911"></td>
          <td id="LC3911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as Alice grew up, for he soon saw I was more afraid of her knowing my</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3912" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3912"></td>
          <td id="LC3912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">past than of the police. Whatever he wanted he must have, and whatever</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3913" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3913"></td>
          <td id="LC3913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was I gave him without question, land, money, houses, until at last</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3914" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3914"></td>
          <td id="LC3914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he asked a thing which I could not give. He asked for Alice.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3915" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3915"></td>
          <td id="LC3915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3916" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3916"></td>
          <td id="LC3916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“His son, you see, had grown up, and so had my girl, and as I was known</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3917" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3917"></td>
          <td id="LC3917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be in weak health, it seemed a fine stroke to him that his lad</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3918" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3918"></td>
          <td id="LC3918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should step into the whole property. But there I was firm. I would not</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3919" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3919"></td>

        </tr>

          <td id="LC3920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the lad, but his blood was in him, and that was enough. I stood firm.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3921" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3921"></td>
          <td id="LC3921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">McCarthy threatened. I braved him to do his worst. We were to meet at</td>

          <td id="L3922" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3922"></td>
          <td id="LC3922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the pool midway between our houses to talk it over.</td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3924" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3924"></td>
          <td id="LC3924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“When I went down there I found him talking with his son, so I smoked a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3925" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3925"></td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L3927" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3927"></td>

        </tr>

        </tr>

          <td id="L3929" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3929"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3930" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3930"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3932" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3932"></td>
          <td id="LC3932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and fairly strong of limb, I knew that my own fate was sealed. But my</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3933" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3933"></td>
          <td id="LC3933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">memory and my girl! Both could be saved if I could but silence that</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3934" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3934"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3935" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3935"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3936" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3936"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3937" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3937"></td>

        <tr>

        </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L3960" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3960"></td>
          <td id="LC3960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“God help us!” said Holmes after a long silence. “Why does fate play</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="L3964" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3964"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3965" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3965"></td>
          <td id="LC3965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">James McCarthy was acquitted at the Assizes on the strength of a number</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3966" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3966"></td>
          <td id="LC3966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of objections which had been drawn out by Holmes and submitted to the</td>

        <tr>

</td>

</td>

          <td id="LC3975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">V. THE FIVE ORANGE PIPS</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3976" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3976"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3977" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3977"></td>
          <td id="LC3977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3978" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3978"></td>
          <td id="LC3978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I glance over my notes and records of the Sherlock Holmes cases</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3979" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3979"></td>
          <td id="LC3979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">between the years ’82 and ’90, I am faced by so many which present</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3980" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3980"></td>
          <td id="LC3980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strange and interesting features that it is no easy matter to know</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3981" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3981"></td>
          <td id="LC3981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which to choose and which to leave. Some, however, have already gained</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3982" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3982"></td>
          <td id="LC3982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">publicity through the papers, and others have not offered a field for</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L3983" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="3983"></td>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4143" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4143"></td>
          <td id="LC4143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“He didn’t mind me; in fact, he took a fancy to me, for at the time</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4144" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4144"></td>
          <td id="LC4144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when he saw me first I was a youngster of twelve or so. This would be</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4145" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4145"></td>
          <td id="LC4145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the year 1878, after he had been eight or nine years in England. He</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4146" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4146"></td>
          <td id="LC4146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">begged my father to let me live with him and he was very kind to me in</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4147" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4147"></td>
          <td id="LC4147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his way. When he was sober he used to be fond of playing backgammon and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4148" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4148"></td>
          <td id="LC4148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">draughts with me, and he would make me his representative both with the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4149" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4149"></td>
          <td id="LC4149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">servants and with the tradespeople, so that by the time that I was</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4150" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4150"></td>
          <td id="LC4150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sixteen I was quite master of the house. I kept all the keys and could</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4151" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4151"></td>
          <td id="LC4151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go where I liked and do what I liked, so long as I did not disturb him</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4152" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4152"></td>
          <td id="LC4152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in his privacy. There was one singular exception, however, for he had a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4153" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4153"></td>
          <td id="LC4153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">single room, a lumber-room up among the attics, which was invariably</td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4159" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4159"></td>
          <td id="LC4159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“One day—it was in March, 1883—a letter with a foreign stamp lay upon</td>

          <td id="L4160" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4160"></td>

        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4164" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4164"></td>

        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>

        </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L4201" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4201"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4202" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4202"></td>
          <td id="LC4202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The singular incident made, as you may think, the deepest impression</td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L4208" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="4208"></td>
          <td id="LC4208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He drank more than ever, and he was less inclined for any sort of</td>
        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>

        <tr>
