          <td id="L6845" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6845"></td>
          <td id="LC6845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6846" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6846"></td>
          <td id="LC6846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What, then?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6847" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6847"></td>
          <td id="LC6847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6848" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6848"></td>
          <td id="LC6848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is fear, Mr. Holmes. It is terror.” She raised her veil as she</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6849" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6849"></td>
          <td id="LC6849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spoke, and we could see that she was indeed in a pitiable state of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6850" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6850"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6851" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6851"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6852" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6852"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6853" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6853"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6854" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6854"></td>
          <td id="LC6854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of his quick, all-comprehensive glances.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6855" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6855"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6856" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6856"></td>
          <td id="LC6856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You must not fear,” said he soothingly, bending forward and patting</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6857" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6857"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6858" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6858"></td>
          <td id="LC6858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have come in by train this morning, I see.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6859" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6859"></td>
          <td id="LC6859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6860" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6860"></td>
          <td id="LC6860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You know me, then?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6861" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6861"></td>
          <td id="LC6861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6862" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6862"></td>
          <td id="LC6862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, but I observe the second half of a return ticket in the palm of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6863" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6863"></td>
          <td id="LC6863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">your left glove. You must have started early, and yet you had a good</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6864" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6864"></td>
          <td id="LC6864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drive in a dog-cart, along heavy roads, before you reached the</td>

</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L6867" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6867"></td>

</td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6876" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6876"></td>

        </tr>

        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="LC6918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Holmes nodded his head. “The name is familiar to me,” said he.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6919" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6919"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6920" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6920"></td>

        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6924" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6924"></td>
          <td id="LC6924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was eventually completed by a gambler in the days of the Regency.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6925" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6925"></td>

          <td id="LC6926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two-hundred-year-old house, which is itself crushed under a heavy</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6927" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6927"></td>

        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6933" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6933"></td>

        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6935" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6935"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6936" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6936"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6937" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6937"></td>
          <td id="LC6937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disappointed man.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6938" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6938"></td>
          <td id="LC6938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6939" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6939"></td>
          <td id="LC6939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“When Dr. Roylott was in India he married my mother, Mrs. Stoner, the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6940" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6940"></td>
          <td id="LC6940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">young widow of Major-General Stoner, of the Bengal Artillery. My sister</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6941" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6941"></td>
          <td id="LC6941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Julia and I were twins, and we were only two years old at the time of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6942" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6942"></td>
          <td id="LC6942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my mother’s re-marriage. She had a considerable sum of money—not less</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L6943" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6943"></td>

          <td id="L6944" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="6944"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7022" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7022"></td>
          <td id="LC7022" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7023" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7023"></td>
          <td id="LC7023" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Tell me, Helen,’ said she, ‘have you ever heard anyone whistle in the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7024" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7024"></td>
          <td id="LC7024" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dead of the night?’</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L7025" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7025"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7026" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7026"></td>
          <td id="LC7026" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Never,’ said I.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7027" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7027"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7028" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7028"></td>
          <td id="LC7028" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘I suppose that you could not possibly whistle, yourself, in your</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC7029" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleep?’</td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7031" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7031"></td>

        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7033" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7033"></td>
          <td id="LC7033" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Because during the last few nights I have always, about three in the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7034" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7034"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        </tr>

</td>

</td>
        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7056" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7056"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7057" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7057"></td>
          <td id="LC7057" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I think that I mentioned to you that the Doctor kept a cheetah and a</td>

          <td id="LC7058" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">baboon. We had no feeling of security unless our doors were locked.”</td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7060" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7060"></td>
          <td id="LC7060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Quite so. Pray proceed with your statement.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7061" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7061"></td>
          <td id="LC7061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7062" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7062"></td>
          <td id="LC7062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I could not sleep that night. A vague feeling of impending misfortune</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7063" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7063"></td>
          <td id="LC7063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impressed me. My sister and I, you will recollect, were twins, and you</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7064" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7064"></td>
          <td id="LC7064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">know how subtle are the links which bind two souls which are so closely</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7065" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7065"></td>
          <td id="LC7065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allied. It was a wild night. The wind was howling outside, and the rain</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7066" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7066"></td>
          <td id="LC7066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was beating and splashing against the windows. Suddenly, amid all the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7067" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7067"></td>
          <td id="LC7067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hubbub of the gale, there burst forth the wild scream of a terrified</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7068" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7068"></td>
          <td id="LC7068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woman. I knew that it was my sister’s voice. I sprang from my bed,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7069" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7069"></td>
          <td id="LC7069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrapped a shawl round me, and rushed into the corridor. As I opened my</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7070" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7070"></td>
          <td id="LC7070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">door I seemed to hear a low whistle, such as my sister described, and a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7071" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7071"></td>
          <td id="LC7071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">few moments later a clanging sound, as if a mass of metal had fallen.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7072" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7072"></td>
          <td id="LC7072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As I ran down the passage, my sister’s door was unlocked, and revolved</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7073" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7073"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7074" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7074"></td>
          <td id="LC7074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what was about to issue from it. By the light of the corridor-lamp I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7075" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7075"></td>
          <td id="LC7075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw my sister appear at the opening, her face blanched with terror, her</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7076" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7076"></td>
          <td id="LC7076" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hands groping for help, her whole figure swaying to and fro like that</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7077" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7077"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7078" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7078"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7079" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7079"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7080" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7080"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7081" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7081"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7082" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7082"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7083" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7083"></td>

        </tr>

          <td id="L7084" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7084"></td>

          <td id="L7085" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7085"></td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L7086" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7086"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7088" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7088"></td>
          <td id="LC7088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and though he poured brandy down her throat and sent for medical aid</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L7089" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7089"></td>
          <td id="LC7089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from the village, all efforts were in vain, for she slowly sank and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7090" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7090"></td>
          <td id="LC7090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">died without having recovered her consciousness. Such was the dreadful</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7091" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7091"></td>
          <td id="LC7091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">end of my beloved sister.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7092" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7092"></td>
          <td id="LC7092" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7093" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7093"></td>
          <td id="LC7093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“One moment,” said Holmes, “are you sure about this whistle and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7094" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7094"></td>
          <td id="LC7094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">metallic sound? Could you swear to it?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7095" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7095"></td>
          <td id="LC7095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7096" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7096"></td>
          <td id="LC7096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That was what the county coroner asked me at the inquiry. It is my</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7097" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7097"></td>
          <td id="LC7097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strong impression that I heard it, and yet, among the crash of the gale</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7098" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7098"></td>
          <td id="LC7098" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the creaking of an old house, I may possibly have been deceived.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7099" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7099"></td>
          <td id="LC7099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7100" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7100"></td>
          <td id="LC7100" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Was your sister dressed?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7101" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7101"></td>
          <td id="LC7101" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7102" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7102"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>

        </tr>

</td>

</td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7327" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7327"></td>
          <td id="LC7327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exact meaning I have been obliged to work out the present prices of the</td>

          <td id="L7328" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7328"></td>

        </tr>

        </tr>

          <td id="L7330" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7330"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7332" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7332"></td>

          <td id="L7336" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7336"></td>

        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7340" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7340"></td>
          <td id="LC7340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">revolver into your pocket. An Eley’s No. 2 is an excellent argument</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7341" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7341"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7342" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7342"></td>
          <td id="LC7342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tooth-brush are, I think, all that we need.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7343" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7343"></td>
          <td id="LC7343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7344" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7344"></td>
          <td id="LC7344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At Waterloo we were fortunate in catching a train for Leatherhead,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7345" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7345"></td>

        <tr>

        <tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>

        <tr>

          <td id="L7910" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7910"></td>
          <td id="LC7910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7911" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7911"></td>
          <td id="LC7911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And also with the result of causing it to turn upon its master at the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7912" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7912"></td>
          <td id="LC7912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other side. Some of the blows of my cane came home and roused its</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7913" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7913"></td>
          <td id="LC7913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">snakish temper, so that it flew upon the first person it saw. In this</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7914" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7914"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7915" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7915"></td>
          <td id="LC7915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">death, and I cannot say that it is likely to weigh very heavily upon my</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7916" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7916"></td>

          <td id="LC7921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">IX. THE ADVENTURE OF THE ENGINEER’S THUMB</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7922" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7922"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7923" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7923"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7924" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7924"></td>
          <td id="LC7924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of all the problems which have been submitted to my friend, Mr.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7925" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7925"></td>
          <td id="LC7925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sherlock Holmes, for solution during the years of our intimacy, there</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7926" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7926"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7927" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7927"></td>
          <td id="LC7927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of Mr. Hatherley’s thumb, and that of Colonel Warburton’s madness. Of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7928" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7928"></td>
          <td id="LC7928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these the latter may have afforded a finer field for an acute and</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L7929" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7929"></td>

        <tr>

          <td id="L7935" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7935"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7937" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7937"></td>
          <td id="LC7937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clears gradually away as each new discovery furnishes a step which</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7938" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7938"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC7942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was in the summer of ’89, not long after my marriage, that the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

</td>
        </tr>

        </tr>

</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L7966" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7966"></td>
          <td id="LC7966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7967" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7967"></td>

        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7970" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7970"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7971" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7971"></td>
          <td id="LC7971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7972" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7972"></td>
          <td id="LC7972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I entered my consulting-room and found a gentleman seated by the table.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7973" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7973"></td>
          <td id="LC7973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He was quietly dressed in a suit of heather tweed with a soft cloth cap</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7974" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7974"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7975" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7975"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7976" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7976"></td>
          <td id="LC7976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was young, not more than five-and-twenty, I should say, with a strong,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7977" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7977"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7978" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7978"></td>
          <td id="LC7978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a man who was suffering from some strong agitation, which it took</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7979" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7979"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7980" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7980"></td>
          <td id="LC7980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7981" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7981"></td>
          <td id="LC7981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I am sorry to knock you up so early, Doctor,” said he, “but I have had</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7982" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7982"></td>
          <td id="LC7982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a very serious accident during the night. I came in by train this</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7983" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7983"></td>
          <td id="LC7983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning, and on inquiring at Paddington as to where I might find a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7984" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7984"></td>
          <td id="LC7984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doctor, a worthy fellow very kindly escorted me here. I gave the maid a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7985" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7985"></td>
          <td id="LC7985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">card, but I see that she has left it upon the side-table.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7986" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7986"></td>
          <td id="LC7986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7987" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7987"></td>
          <td id="LC7987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I took it up and glanced at it. “Mr. Victor Hatherley, hydraulic</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7988" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7988"></td>
          <td id="LC7988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">engineer, 16A, Victoria Street (3rd floor).” That was the name, style,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L7989" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="7989"></td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L8150" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8150"></td>
          <td id="LC8150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">preserving a secret.’</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8151" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8151"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8152" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8152"></td>
          <td id="LC8152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I bowed, feeling as flattered as any young man would at such an</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8153" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8153"></td>
          <td id="LC8153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">address. ‘May I ask who it was who gave me so good a character?’</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8154" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8154"></td>
          <td id="LC8154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8155" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8155"></td>
          <td id="LC8155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Well, perhaps it is better that I should not tell you that just at</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8156" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8156"></td>
          <td id="LC8156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this moment. I have it from the same source that you are both an orphan</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8157" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8157"></td>
          <td id="LC8157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a bachelor and are residing alone in London.’</td>

</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="LC8159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘That is quite correct,’ I answered; ‘but you will excuse me if I say</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8160" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8160"></td>
          <td id="LC8160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I cannot see how all this bears upon my professional</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8161" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8161"></td>
          <td id="LC8161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">qualifications. I understand that it was on a professional matter that</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8164" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8164"></td>
          <td id="LC8164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Undoubtedly so. But you will find that all I say is really to the</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L8165" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8165"></td>

        </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8194" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8194"></td>

</td>

          <td id="LC8198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘I beg that you will state your business, sir,’ said I; ‘my time is of</td>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8206" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8206"></td>
          <td id="LC8206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘I say a night’s work, but an hour’s would be nearer the mark. I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8207" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8207"></td>
          <td id="LC8207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">simply want your opinion about a hydraulic stamping machine which has</td>

          <td id="LC8209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">right ourselves. What do you think of such a commission as that?’</td>
        </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8217" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8217"></td>
          <td id="LC8217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘To Eyford, in Berkshire. It is a little place near the borders of</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="LC8218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Oxfordshire, and within seven miles of Reading. There is a train from</td>

          <td id="LC8219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Paddington which would bring you there at about 11:15.’</td>

</td>

        </tr>

</td>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

          <td id="LC8227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Yes, our little place is quite out in the country. It is a good seven</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8228" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8228"></td>
          <td id="LC8228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">miles from Eyford Station.’</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8229" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8229"></td>
          <td id="LC8229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8230" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8230"></td>
          <td id="LC8230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Then we can hardly get there before midnight. I suppose there would</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8231" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8231"></td>
          <td id="LC8231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be no chance of a train back. I should be compelled to stop the night.’</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8232" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8232"></td>
          <td id="LC8232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8233" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8233"></td>
          <td id="LC8233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Yes, we could easily give you a shake-down.’</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L8234" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8234"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8235" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8235"></td>
          <td id="LC8235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘That is very awkward. Could I not come at some more convenient hour?’</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8236" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8236"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8237" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8237"></td>
          <td id="LC8237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘We have judged it best that you should come late. It is to recompense</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8238" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8238"></td>

        </tr>

          <td id="L8239" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8239"></td>

          <td id="L8242" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8242"></td>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8248" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8248"></td>
          <td id="LC8248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Quite so. It is very natural that the pledge of secrecy which we have</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

        </tr>

          <td id="L8250" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8250"></td>

</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L8254" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8254"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8255" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8255"></td>
          <td id="LC8255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Then the matter stands thus. You are probably aware that</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8259" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8259"></td>
          <td id="LC8259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘I have heard so.’</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8260" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8260"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8261" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8261"></td>
          <td id="LC8261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Some little time ago I bought a small place—a very small place—within</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8262" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8262"></td>
          <td id="LC8262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ten miles of Reading. I was fortunate enough to discover that there was</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8263" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8263"></td>
          <td id="LC8263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a deposit of fuller’s-earth in one of my fields. On examining it,</td>

          <td id="L8264" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8264"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8265" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8265"></td>
          <td id="LC8265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that it formed a link between two very much larger ones upon the right</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8266" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8266"></td>
          <td id="LC8266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and left—both of them, however, in the grounds of my neighbours. These</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8267" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8267"></td>
          <td id="LC8267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">good people were absolutely ignorant that their land contained that</td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8270" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8270"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8285" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8285"></td>

        </tr>

          <td id="L8289" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8289"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8290" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8290"></td>
          <td id="LC8290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Ah!’ said he carelessly, ‘we have our own process. We compress the</td>
        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8294" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8294"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8295" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8295"></td>

</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="LC8296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘I shall certainly be there.’</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8298" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8298"></td>
          <td id="LC8298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘And not a word to a soul.’ He looked at me with a last long,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8299" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8299"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8300" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8300"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8302" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8302"></td>
          <td id="LC8302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, when I came to think it all over in cool blood I was very much</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8303" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8303"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8304" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8304"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8305" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8305"></td>
          <td id="LC8305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fee was at least tenfold what I should have asked had I set a price</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8306" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8306"></td>
          <td id="LC8306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon my own services, and it was possible that this order might lead to</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8307" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8307"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8308" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8308"></td>
          <td id="LC8308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made an unpleasant impression upon me, and I could not think that his</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8309" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8309"></td>
          <td id="LC8309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">explanation of the fuller’s-earth was sufficient to explain the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8310" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8310"></td>
          <td id="LC8310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">necessity for my coming at midnight, and his extreme anxiety lest I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8311" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8311"></td>
          <td id="LC8311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">should tell anyone of my errand. However, I threw all fears to the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8312" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8312"></td>
          <td id="LC8312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">winds, ate a hearty supper, drove to Paddington, and started off,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8313" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8313"></td>
          <td id="LC8313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">having obeyed to the letter the injunction as to holding my tongue.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8314" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8314"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8315" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8315"></td>
          <td id="LC8315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“At Reading I had to change not only my carriage but my station.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8316" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8316"></td>
          <td id="LC8316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">However, I was in time for the last train to Eyford, and I reached the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8317" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8317"></td>
          <td id="LC8317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">little dim-lit station after eleven o’clock. I was the only passenger</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8318" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8318"></td>

        </tr>

          <td id="L8319" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8319"></td>
          <td id="LC8319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleepy porter with a lantern. As I passed out through the wicket gate,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8320" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8320"></td>
          <td id="LC8320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">however, I found my acquaintance of the morning waiting in the shadow</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8321" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8321"></td>
          <td id="LC8321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon the other side. Without a word he grasped my arm and hurried me</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8322" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8322"></td>
          <td id="LC8322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into a carriage, the door of which was standing open. He drew up the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8323" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8323"></td>
          <td id="LC8323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">windows on either side, tapped on the wood-work, and away we went as</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8324" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8324"></td>
          <td id="LC8324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fast as the horse could go.”</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L8325" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8325"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8342" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8342"></td>
          <td id="LC8342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Away we went then, and we drove for at least an hour. Colonel Lysander</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8343" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8343"></td>
          <td id="LC8343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Stark had said that it was only seven miles, but I should think, from</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8344" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8344"></td>
          <td id="LC8344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the rate that we seemed to go, and from the time that we took, that it</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8345" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8345"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8346" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8346"></td>
          <td id="LC8346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time, and I was aware, more than once when I glanced in his direction,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8347" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8347"></td>
          <td id="LC8347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that he was looking at me with great intensity. The country roads seem</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8348" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8348"></td>
          <td id="LC8348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be not very good in that part of the world, for we lurched and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8349" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8349"></td>
          <td id="LC8349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">jolted terribly. I tried to look out of the windows to see something of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8350" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8350"></td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L8351" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8351"></td>

          <td id="L8352" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8352"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8353" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8353"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8354" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8354"></td>
          <td id="LC8354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flagged. At last, however, the bumping of the road was exchanged for</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8355" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8355"></td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L8356" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8356"></td>

        </tr>

          <td id="L8357" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8357"></td>

        <tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>

        <tr>
          <td id="L8363" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8363"></td>
          <td id="LC8363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8364" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8364"></td>
          <td id="LC8364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It was pitch dark inside the house, and the colonel fumbled about</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8365" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8365"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>

        </tr>

          <td id="L8368" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8368"></td>

          <td id="LC8370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the gloss with which the light shone upon her dark dress I knew that it</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8371" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8371"></td>

        <tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8374" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8374"></td>

        </tr>

        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8378" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8378"></td>
          <td id="LC8378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Perhaps you will have the kindness to wait in this room for a few</td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td id="L8380" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8380"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8383" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8383"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8384" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8384"></td>
          <td id="LC8384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8385" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8385"></td>
          <td id="LC8385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I glanced at the books upon the table, and in spite of my ignorance of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8386" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8386"></td>
          <td id="LC8386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">German I could see that two of them were treatises on science, the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8387" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8387"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8388" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8388"></td>
          <td id="LC8388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hoping that I might catch some glimpse of the country-side, but an oak</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8389" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8389"></td>
          <td id="LC8389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shutter, heavily barred, was folded across it. It was a wonderfully</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8390" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8390"></td>
          <td id="LC8390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silent house. There was an old clock ticking loudly somewhere in the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8391" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8391"></td>

          <td id="L8547" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8547"></td>
          <td id="LC8547" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreadful snap. Easier the other way, perhaps; and yet, had I the nerve</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8548" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8548"></td>
          <td id="LC8548" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to lie and look up at that deadly black shadow wavering down upon me?</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8549" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8549"></td>
          <td id="LC8549" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Already I was unable to stand erect, when my eye caught something which</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8550" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8550"></td>
          <td id="LC8550" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brought a gush of hope back to my heart.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8551" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8551"></td>
          <td id="LC8551" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8552" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8552"></td>
          <td id="LC8552" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I have said that though the floor and ceiling were of iron, the walls</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8553" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8553"></td>
          <td id="LC8553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were of wood. As I gave a last hurried glance around, I saw a thin line</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8554" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8554"></td>
          <td id="LC8554" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of yellow light between two of the boards, which broadened and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8555" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8555"></td>
          <td id="LC8555" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">broadened as a small panel was pushed backward. For an instant I could</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8556" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8556"></td>
          <td id="LC8556" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hardly believe that here was indeed a door which led away from death.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8557" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8557"></td>
          <td id="LC8557" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The next instant I threw myself through, and lay half-fainting upon the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8558" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8558"></td>
          <td id="LC8558" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other side. The panel had closed again behind me, but the crash of the</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="LC8559" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lamp, and a few moments afterwards the clang of the two slabs of metal,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8560" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8560"></td>
          <td id="LC8560" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told me how narrow had been my escape.</td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8562" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8562"></td>

          <td id="L8563" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8563"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8568" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8568"></td>
          <td id="LC8568" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Come! come!’ she cried breathlessly. ‘They will be here in a moment.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8569" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8569"></td>

</td>

          <td id="L8577" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8577"></td>
          <td id="LC8577" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guide stopped and looked about her like one  who is at her wit’s end.</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L8578" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8578"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8581" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8581"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8582" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8582"></td>

        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8584" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8584"></td>
          <td id="LC8584" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“As she spoke a light sprang into view at the further end of the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8585" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8585"></td>
          <td id="LC8585" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">passage, and I saw the lean figure of Colonel Lysander Stark rushing</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8586" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8586"></td>

          <td id="L8587" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8587"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8588" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8588"></td>

        <tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8590" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8590"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8591" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8591"></td>

        </tr>

        <tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8597" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8597"></td>
          <td id="LC8597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Fritz! Fritz!’ she cried in English, ‘remember your promise after the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8598" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8598"></td>

        </tr>

          <td id="L8599" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8599"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8600" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8600"></td>
          <td id="LC8600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8601" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8601"></td>
          <td id="LC8601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘You are mad, Elise!’ he shouted, struggling to break away from her.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8602" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8602"></td>
          <td id="LC8602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">‘You will be the ruin of us. He has seen too much. Let me pass, I say!’</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L8603" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8603"></td>
          <td id="LC8603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He dashed her to one side, and, rushing to the window, cut at me with</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L8604" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8604"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8605" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8605"></td>
          <td id="LC8605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sill, when his blow fell. I was conscious of a dull pain, my grip</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8606" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8606"></td>
          <td id="LC8606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">loosened, and I fell into the garden below.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8607" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8607"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8608" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8608"></td>
          <td id="LC8608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I was shaken but not hurt by the fall; so I picked myself up and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8609" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8609"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8610" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8610"></td>

        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8612" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8612"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8613" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8613"></td>
          <td id="LC8613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that my thumb had been cut off and that the blood was pouring from my</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8614" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8614"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8615" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8615"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8616" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8616"></td>
          <td id="LC8616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the rose-bushes.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8617" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8617"></td>
          <td id="LC8617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8618" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8618"></td>
          <td id="LC8618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How long I remained unconscious I cannot tell. It must have been a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8619" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8619"></td>
          <td id="LC8619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very long time, for the moon had sunk, and a bright morning was</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8620" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8620"></td>
          <td id="LC8620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">breaking when I came to myself. My clothes were all sodden with dew,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8621" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8621"></td>
          <td id="LC8621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and my coat-sleeve was drenched with blood from my wounded thumb. The</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8622" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8622"></td>
          <td id="LC8622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smarting of it recalled in an instant all the particulars of my night’s</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8623" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8623"></td>
          <td id="LC8623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">adventure, and I sprang to my feet with the feeling that I might hardly</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8624" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8624"></td>
          <td id="LC8624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">yet be safe from my pursuers. But to my astonishment, when I came to</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8625" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8625"></td>
          <td id="LC8625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">look round me, neither house nor garden were to be seen. I had been</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8626" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8626"></td>

</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L8705" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8705"></td>
          <td id="LC8705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And I say east,” said my patient.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8706" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8706"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8782" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8782"></td>
          <td id="LC8782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8783" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8783"></td>
          <td id="LC8783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, at least,” said Holmes, “you have had your revenge upon them.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8784" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8784"></td>
          <td id="LC8784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There can be no question that it was your oil-lamp which, when it was</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8785" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8785"></td>
          <td id="LC8785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crushed in the press, set fire to the wooden walls, though no doubt</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8786" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8786"></td>
          <td id="LC8786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they were too excited in the chase after you to observe it at the time.</td>
        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8929" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8929"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8935" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8935"></td>

</td>

          <td id="LC8938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I have very little difficulty in finding what I want,” said I, “for</td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8943" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8943"></td>
          <td id="LC8943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, you mean the little problem of the Grosvenor Square furniture van.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L8944" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8944"></td>
          <td id="LC8944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That is quite cleared up now—though, indeed, it was obvious from the</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L8945" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="8945"></td>
          <td id="LC8945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first. Pray give me the results of your newspaper selections.”</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>

</td>
        </tr>

        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9162" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9162"></td>
          <td id="LC9162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The nobleman swung his glasses a little faster and stared down into the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9163" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9163"></td>
          <td id="LC9163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fire. “You see, Mr. Holmes,” said he, “my wife was twenty before her</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L9164" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9164"></td>
          <td id="LC9164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father became a rich man. During that time she ran free in a mining</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9165" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9165"></td>

          <td id="L9166" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9166"></td>
