        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9167" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9167"></td>
          <td id="LC9167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in England a tomboy, with a strong nature, wild and free, unfettered by</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9168" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9168"></td>
          <td id="LC9168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any sort of traditions. She is impetuous—volcanic, I was about to say.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9169" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9169"></td>
          <td id="LC9169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She is swift in making up her mind and fearless in carrying out her</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9170" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9170"></td>
          <td id="LC9170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">resolutions. On the other hand, I would not have given her the name</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9172" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9172"></td>
          <td id="LC9172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not thought her to be at bottom a noble woman. I believe that she is</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L9173" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9173"></td>

          <td id="LC9175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9176" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9176"></td>

          <td id="L9177" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9177"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9178" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9178"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9179" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9179"></td>
          <td id="LC9179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">face of a very lovely woman. It was not a photograph but an ivory</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9180" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9180"></td>
          <td id="LC9180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">miniature, and the artist had brought out the full effect of the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9181" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9181"></td>
          <td id="LC9181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lustrous black hair, the large dark eyes, and the exquisite mouth.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9182" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9182"></td>
          <td id="LC9182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Holmes gazed long and earnestly at it. Then he closed the locket and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9183" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9183"></td>

        </tr>

          <td id="L9184" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9184"></td>
          <td id="LC9184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9185" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9185"></td>
          <td id="LC9185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The young lady came to London, then, and you renewed your</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9186" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9186"></td>
          <td id="LC9186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">acquaintance?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9187" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9187"></td>
          <td id="LC9187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>

</td>

        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

        <tr>
          <td id="L9594" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9594"></td>
          <td id="LC9594" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to be.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9595" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9595"></td>
          <td id="LC9595" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9596" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9596"></td>
          <td id="LC9596" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Pray make no apology to me,” said Lord St. Simon bitterly.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9597" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9597"></td>
          <td id="LC9597" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9598" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9598"></td>
          <td id="LC9598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Oh, yes, I know that I have treated you real bad and that I should</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9599" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9599"></td>
          <td id="LC9599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have spoken to you before I went; but I was kind of rattled, and from</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9600" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9600"></td>
          <td id="LC9600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the time when I saw Frank here again I just didn’t know what I was</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9601" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9601"></td>
          <td id="LC9601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doing or saying. I only wonder I didn’t fall down and do a faint right</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9602" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9602"></td>
          <td id="LC9602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there before the altar.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9603" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9603"></td>
          <td id="LC9603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9604" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9604"></td>
          <td id="LC9604" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Perhaps, Mrs. Moulton, you would like my friend and me to leave the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9605" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9605"></td>
          <td id="LC9605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">room while you explain this matter?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9606" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9606"></td>
          <td id="LC9606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9607" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9607"></td>
          <td id="LC9607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If I may give an opinion,” remarked the strange gentleman, “we’ve had</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9608" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9608"></td>
          <td id="LC9608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just a little too much secrecy over this business already. For my part,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9609" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9609"></td>
          <td id="LC9609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should like all Europe and America to hear the rights of it.” He was</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9610" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9610"></td>
          <td id="LC9610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a small, wiry, sunburnt man, clean-shaven, with a sharp face and alert</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9611" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9611"></td>
          <td id="LC9611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">manner.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9612" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9612"></td>
          <td id="LC9612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9613" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9613"></td>
          <td id="LC9613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Then I’ll tell our story right away,” said the lady. “Frank here and I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9614" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9614"></td>
          <td id="LC9614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">met in ’84, in McQuire’s camp, near the Rockies, where Pa was working a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9615" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9615"></td>
          <td id="LC9615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">claim. We were engaged to each other, Frank and I; but then one day</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9616" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9616"></td>
          <td id="LC9616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">father struck a rich pocket and made a pile, while poor Frank here had</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9617" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9617"></td>
          <td id="LC9617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a claim that petered out and came to nothing. The richer Pa grew the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9618" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9618"></td>
          <td id="LC9618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">poorer was Frank; so at last Pa wouldn’t hear of our engagement lasting</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9619" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9619"></td>
          <td id="LC9619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any longer, and he took me away to ’Frisco. Frank wouldn’t throw up his</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9620" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9620"></td>
          <td id="LC9620" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hand, though; so he followed me there, and he saw me without Pa knowing</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9621" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9621"></td>
          <td id="LC9621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything about it. It would only have made him mad to know, so we just</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9622" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9622"></td>
          <td id="LC9622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fixed it all up for ourselves. Frank said that he would go and make his</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9623" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9623"></td>
          <td id="LC9623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pile, too, and never come back to claim me until he had as much as Pa.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9624" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9624"></td>
          <td id="LC9624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So then I promised to wait for him to the end of time and pledged</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9625" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9625"></td>
          <td id="LC9625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">myself not to marry anyone else while he lived. ‘Why shouldn’t we be</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9626" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9626"></td>
          <td id="LC9626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">married right away, then,’ said he, ‘and then I will feel sure of you;</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9627" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9627"></td>
          <td id="LC9627" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I won’t claim to be your husband until I come back?’ Well, we</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9628" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9628"></td>
          <td id="LC9628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">talked it over, and he had fixed it all up so nicely, with a clergyman</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9629" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9629"></td>
          <td id="LC9629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all ready in waiting, that we just did it right there; and then Frank</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9630" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9630"></td>
          <td id="LC9630" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went off to seek his fortune, and I went back to Pa.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9631" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9631"></td>
          <td id="LC9631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9632" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9632"></td>
          <td id="LC9632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The next I heard of Frank was that he was in Montana, and then he went</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9633" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9633"></td>
          <td id="LC9633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prospecting in Arizona, and then I heard of him from New Mexico. After</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9634" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9634"></td>
          <td id="LC9634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that came a long newspaper story about how a miners’ camp had been</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9635" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9635"></td>
          <td id="LC9635" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">attacked by Apache Indians, and there was my Frank’s name among the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9636" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9636"></td>
          <td id="LC9636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">killed. I fainted dead away, and I was very sick for months after. Pa</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9637" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9637"></td>
          <td id="LC9637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought I had a decline and took me to half the doctors in ’Frisco. Not</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9638" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9638"></td>
          <td id="LC9638" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a word of news came for a year and more, so that I never doubted that</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9639" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9639"></td>
          <td id="LC9639" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Frank was really dead. Then Lord St. Simon came to ’Frisco, and we came</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9640" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9640"></td>
          <td id="LC9640" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to London, and a marriage was arranged, and Pa was very pleased, but I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9641" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9641"></td>
          <td id="LC9641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">felt all the time that no man on this earth would ever take the place</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9642" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9642"></td>
          <td id="LC9642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in my heart that had been given to my poor Frank.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9643" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9643"></td>
          <td id="LC9643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9644" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9644"></td>
          <td id="LC9644" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Still, if I had married Lord St. Simon, of course I’d have done my</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9645" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9645"></td>
          <td id="LC9645" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">duty by him. We can’t command our love, but we can our actions. I went</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9646" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9646"></td>
          <td id="LC9646" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the altar with him with the intention to make him just as good a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9647" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9647"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9648" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9648"></td>
          <td id="LC9648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as I came to the altar rails, I glanced back and saw Frank standing and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9649" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9649"></td>
          <td id="LC9649" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking at me out of the first pew. I thought it was his ghost at</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9650" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9650"></td>
          <td id="LC9650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first; but when I looked again there he was still, with a kind of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9651" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9651"></td>
          <td id="LC9651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">question in his eyes, as if to ask me whether I were glad or sorry to</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9652" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9652"></td>
          <td id="LC9652" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">see him. I wonder I didn’t drop. I know that everything was turning</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9653" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9653"></td>
          <td id="LC9653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">round, and the words of the clergyman were just like the buzz of a bee</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9654" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9654"></td>
          <td id="LC9654" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in my ear. I didn’t know what to do. Should I stop the service and make</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9655" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9655"></td>
          <td id="LC9655" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a scene in the church? I glanced at him again, and he seemed to know</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9656" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9656"></td>
          <td id="LC9656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what I was thinking, for he raised his finger to his lips to tell me to</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9657" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9657"></td>
          <td id="LC9657" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be still. Then I saw him scribble on a piece of paper, and I knew that</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9658" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9658"></td>
          <td id="LC9658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he was writing me a note. As I passed his pew on the way out I dropped</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9659" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9659"></td>
          <td id="LC9659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my bouquet over to him, and he slipped the note into my hand when he</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9660" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9660"></td>
          <td id="LC9660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">returned me the flowers. It was only a line asking me to join him when</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9661" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9661"></td>
          <td id="LC9661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he made the sign to me to do so. Of course I never doubted for a moment</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9662" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9662"></td>
          <td id="LC9662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that my first duty was now to him, and I determined to do just whatever</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9663" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9663"></td>
          <td id="LC9663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he might direct.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9664" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9664"></td>
          <td id="LC9664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9665" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9665"></td>
          <td id="LC9665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“When I got back I told my maid, who had known him in California, and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9666" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9666"></td>
          <td id="LC9666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had always been his friend. I ordered her to say nothing, but to get a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9667" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9667"></td>
          <td id="LC9667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">few things packed and my ulster ready. I know I ought to have spoken to</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9668" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9668"></td>
          <td id="LC9668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lord St. Simon, but it was dreadful hard before his mother and all</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9669" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9669"></td>
          <td id="LC9669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">those great people. I just made up my mind to run away and explain</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9670" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9670"></td>
          <td id="LC9670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afterwards. I hadn’t been at the table ten minutes before I saw Frank</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9671" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9671"></td>
          <td id="LC9671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out of the window at the other side of the road. He beckoned to me and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9672" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9672"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9831" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9831"></td>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

          <td id="LC9901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is, of course, well known to you that in a successful banking</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L9909" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9909"></td>
          <td id="LC9909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9910" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9910"></td>
          <td id="LC9910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yesterday morning I was seated in my office at the bank when a card</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9911" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9911"></td>
          <td id="LC9911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was brought in to me by one of the clerks. I started when I saw the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9912" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9912"></td>
          <td id="LC9912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">name, for it was that of none other than—well, perhaps even to you I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9913" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9913"></td>
          <td id="LC9913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had better say no more than that it was a name which is a household</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9914" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9914"></td>
          <td id="LC9914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">word all over the earth—one of the highest, noblest, most exalted names</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9915" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9915"></td>
          <td id="LC9915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in England. I was overwhelmed by the honour and attempted, when he</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9916" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9916"></td>
          <td id="LC9916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">entered, to say so, but he plunged at once into business with the air</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9917" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9917"></td>
          <td id="LC9917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a man who wishes to hurry quickly through a disagreeable task.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9918" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9918"></td>
          <td id="LC9918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9919" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9919"></td>
          <td id="LC9919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Mr. Holder,’ said he, ‘I have been informed that you are in the habit</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9920" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9920"></td>
          <td id="LC9920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of advancing money.’</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9921" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9921"></td>
          <td id="LC9921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9922" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9922"></td>
          <td id="LC9922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘The firm does so when the security is good.’ I answered.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9923" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9923"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9924" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9924"></td>
          <td id="LC9924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘It is absolutely essential to me,’ said he, ‘that I should have £</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9925" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9925"></td>
          <td id="LC9925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">50,000 at once. I could, of course, borrow so trifling a sum ten times</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9926" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9926"></td>
          <td id="LC9926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over from my friends, but I much prefer to make it a matter of business</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9927" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9927"></td>

        </tr>

          <td id="L9928" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9928"></td>
          <td id="LC9928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understand that it is unwise to place one’s self under obligations.’</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9929" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9929"></td>
          <td id="LC9929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9930" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9930"></td>
          <td id="LC9930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘For how long, may I ask, do you want this sum?’ I asked.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9931" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9931"></td>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9937" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9937"></td>
          <td id="LC9937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘I should be happy to advance it without further parley from my own</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9939" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9939"></td>
          <td id="LC9939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more than it could bear. If, on the other hand, I am to do it in the</td>

          <td id="L9940" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9940"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9943" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9943"></td>
          <td id="LC9943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘I should much prefer to have it so,’ said he, raising up a square,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9944" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9944"></td>

        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L9947" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9947"></td>
          <td id="LC9947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘One of the most precious public possessions of the empire,’ said I.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9948" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9948"></td>
          <td id="LC9948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9949" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9949"></td>
          <td id="LC9949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Precisely.’ He opened the case, and there, imbedded in soft,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9950" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9950"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9951" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9951"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9953" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9953"></td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L9954" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9954"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9955" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9955"></td>
          <td id="LC9955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9956" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9956"></td>
          <td id="LC9956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I took the precious case into my hands and looked in some perplexity</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9957" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9957"></td>
          <td id="LC9957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from it to my illustrious client.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9958" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9958"></td>
          <td id="LC9958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9959" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9959"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9960" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9960"></td>
          <td id="LC9960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9961" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9961"></td>
          <td id="LC9961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Not at all. I only doubt—’</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9962" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9962"></td>
          <td id="LC9962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9963" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9963"></td>
          <td id="LC9963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘The propriety of my leaving it. You may set your mind at rest about</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9964" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9964"></td>
          <td id="LC9964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that. I should not dream of doing so were it not absolutely certain</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9965" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9965"></td>
          <td id="LC9965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I should be able in four days to reclaim it. It is a pure matter</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9966" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9966"></td>
          <td id="LC9966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of form. Is the security sufficient?’</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9967" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9967"></td>
          <td id="LC9967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9968" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9968"></td>
          <td id="LC9968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Ample.’</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9969" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9969"></td>
          <td id="LC9969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9970" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9970"></td>
          <td id="LC9970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘You understand, Mr. Holder, that I am giving you a strong proof of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9971" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9971"></td>
          <td id="LC9971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the confidence which I have in you, founded upon all that I have heard</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9972" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9972"></td>
          <td id="LC9972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of you. I rely upon you not only to be discreet and to refrain from all</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9973" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9973"></td>
          <td id="LC9973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gossip upon the matter but, above all, to preserve this coronet with</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9974" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9974"></td>
          <td id="LC9974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">every possible precaution because I need not say that a great public</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9975" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9975"></td>
          <td id="LC9975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scandal would be caused if any harm were to befall it. Any injury to it</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9976" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9976"></td>
          <td id="LC9976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would be almost as serious as its complete loss, for there are no</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9977" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9977"></td>
          <td id="LC9977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beryls in the world to match these, and it would be impossible to</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9978" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9978"></td>
          <td id="LC9978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">replace them. I leave it with you, however, with every confidence, and</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9979" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9979"></td>
          <td id="LC9979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I shall call for it in person on Monday morning.’</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9980" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9980"></td>
          <td id="LC9980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9981" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9981"></td>
          <td id="LC9981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Seeing that my client was anxious to leave, I said no more but,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9982" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9982"></td>
          <td id="LC9982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">calling for my cashier, I ordered him to pay over fifty £ 1000 notes.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9983" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9983"></td>
          <td id="LC9983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">When I was alone once more, however, with the precious case lying upon</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9984" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9984"></td>
          <td id="LC9984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the table in front of me, I could not but think with some misgivings of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9985" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9985"></td>
          <td id="LC9985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the immense responsibility which it entailed upon me. There could be no</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9986" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9986"></td>
          <td id="LC9986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doubt that, as it was a national possession, a horrible scandal would</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9987" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9987"></td>
          <td id="LC9987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ensue if any misfortune should occur to it. I already regretted having</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9988" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9988"></td>
          <td id="LC9988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ever consented to take charge of it. However, it was too late to alter</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L9989" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="9989"></td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L10148" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10148"></td>
          <td id="LC10148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘Arthur!’ I screamed, ‘you villain! you thief! How dare you touch that</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L10149" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10149"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L10151" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10151"></td>
          <td id="LC10151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The gas was half up, as I had left it, and my unhappy boy, dressed</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L10152" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10152"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L10153" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10153"></td>
          <td id="LC10153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the coronet in his hands. He appeared to be wrenching at it, or bending</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L10154" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10154"></td>

          <td id="L10155" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10155"></td>

          <td id="LC10156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gold corners, with three of the beryls in it, was missing.</td>

          <td id="L10157" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10157"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L10158" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10158"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

          <td id="LC10184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“By this time the whole house was astir, for I had raised my voice in</td>

        </tr>

</td>

          <td id="LC10200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“‘That you may get away, or perhaps that you may conceal what you have</td>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

        </tr>

          <td id="L10219" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10219"></td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L10220" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10220"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L10221" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10221"></td>
          <td id="LC10221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I, after going through all the police formalities, have hurried round</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L10222" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10222"></td>

        </tr>

          <td id="LC10223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">police have openly confessed that they can at present make nothing of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L10224" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10224"></td>
          <td id="LC10224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it. You may go to any expense which you think necessary. I have already</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L10225" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10225"></td>
          <td id="LC10225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">offered a reward of £ 1000. My God, what shall I do! I have lost my</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L10226" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10226"></td>
          <td id="LC10226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">honour, my gems, and my son in one night. Oh, what shall I do!”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L10227" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10227"></td>
          <td id="LC10227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">

        </tr>

</td>

          <td id="LC10467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is a noiseless lock,” said he. “It is no wonder that it did not</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L10468" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10468"></td>
          <td id="LC10468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wake you. This case, I presume, contains the coronet. We must have a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L10469" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10469"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L10470" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10470"></td>
          <td id="LC10470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon the table. It was a magnificent specimen of the jeweller’s art,</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L10471" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10471"></td>
          <td id="LC10471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the thirty-six stones were the finest that I have ever seen. At one</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

        </tr>

          <td id="L10792" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10792"></td>

</td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L10870" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="10870"></td>
          <td id="LC10870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11191" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11191"></td>
          <td id="LC11191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, Miss Hunter, if your mind is made up, that settles the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11192" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11192"></td>
          <td id="LC11192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">question,” said Holmes, smiling.</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11249" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11249"></td>
          <td id="LC11249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was not very long before my friend’s prediction was fulfilled. A</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L11250" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11250"></td>

        <tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11252" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11252"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11253" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11253"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11254" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11254"></td>

        </tr>

          <td id="L11255" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11255"></td>

        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>

        </tr>

          <td id="L11261" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11261"></td>

          <td id="L11262" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11262"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11263" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11263"></td>
          <td id="LC11263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The telegram which we eventually received came late one night just as I</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11264" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11264"></td>

        </tr>

          <td id="L11266" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11266"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11267" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11267"></td>
          <td id="LC11267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">find him in the same position when I came down to breakfast in the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11268" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11268"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11269" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11269"></td>
          <td id="LC11269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">message, threw it across to me.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11270" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11270"></td>
          <td id="LC11270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11271" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11271"></td>
          <td id="LC11271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Just look up the trains in Bradshaw,” said he, and turned back to his</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L11432" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11432"></td>

</td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11668" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11668"></td>
          <td id="LC11668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">caressing and soothing his manner was—‘and what has frightened you, my</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11669" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11669"></td>
          <td id="LC11669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dear young lady?’</td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11671" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11671"></td>
          <td id="LC11671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But his voice was just a little too coaxing. He overdid it. I was</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L11672" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11672"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11674" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11674"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11675" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11675"></td>
          <td id="LC11675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is so lonely and eerie in this dim light that I was frightened and ran</td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L11676" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11676"></td>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="LC11696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I was so terrified that I do not know what I did. I suppose that I</td>

        </tr>

        </tr>

        <tr>

          <td id="LC11718" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11719" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11719"></td>
          <td id="LC11719" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Holmes and I had listened spellbound to this extraordinary story. My</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="L11720" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11720"></td>

</td>

</td>

          <td id="L11731" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11731"></td>

</td>
        </tr>

</td>

          <td id="LC11736" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You seem to me to have acted all through this matter like a very brave</td>
        </tr>

</td>
        </tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11742" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11742"></td>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11743" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11743"></td>
          <td id="LC11743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We shall be at the Copper Beeches by seven o’clock, my friend and I.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11744" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11744"></td>
          <td id="LC11744" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Rucastles will be gone by that time, and Toller will, we hope, be</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11745" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11745"></td>
          <td id="LC11745" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">incapable. There only remains Mrs. Toller, who might give the alarm. If</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11746" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11746"></td>
          <td id="LC11746" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">you could send her into the cellar on some errand, and then turn the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11747" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11747"></td>
          <td id="LC11747" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">key upon her, you would facilitate matters immensely.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11748" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11748"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <tr>

</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11823" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11823"></td>
          <td id="LC11823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But how?”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11824" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11824"></td>
          <td id="LC11824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11825" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11825"></td>
          <td id="LC11825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Through the skylight. We shall soon see how he managed it.” He swung</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11826" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11826"></td>
          <td id="LC11826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">himself up onto the roof. “Ah, yes,” he cried, “here’s the end of a</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11827" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11827"></td>
          <td id="LC11827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long light ladder against the eaves. That is how he did it.”</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11898" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11898"></td>

        <tr>
          <td id="L11899" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11899"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11900" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11900"></td>
          <td id="LC11900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">husband coming forward, who would ask for all that the law would give</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11901" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11901"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11902" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11902"></td>
          <td id="LC11902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to sign a paper, so that whether she married or not, he could use her</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11903" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11903"></td>
          <td id="LC11903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">money. When she wouldn’t do it, he kept on worrying her until she got</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11904" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11904"></td>
          <td id="LC11904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brain-fever, and for six weeks was at death’s door. Then she got better</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11905" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11905"></td>
          <td id="LC11905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at last, all worn to a shadow, and with her beautiful hair cut off; but</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L11906" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="11906"></td>
          <td id="LC11906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that didn’t make no change in her young man, and he stuck to her as</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>

        </tr>

</td>

          <td id="LC12149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">1.F.1. Project Gutenberg volunteers and employees expend considerable</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L12150" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="12150"></td>
          <td id="LC12150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">effort to identify, do copyright research on, transcribe and proofread</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L12151" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="12151"></td>
          <td id="LC12151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">works not protected by U.S. copyright law in creating the Project</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L12152" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="12152"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L12153" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="12153"></td>

        </tr>
        <tr>

</td>
        </tr>

          <td id="LC12216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">electronic works in formats readable by the widest variety of</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L12217" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="12217"></td>
          <td id="LC12217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">computers including obsolete, old, middle-aged and new computers. It</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L12218" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="12218"></td>
          <td id="LC12218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exists because of the efforts of hundreds of volunteers and donations</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L12219" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="12219"></td>
          <td id="LC12219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">from people in all walks of life.</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L12220" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="12220"></td>
          <td id="LC12220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L12221" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="12221"></td>
          <td id="LC12221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Volunteers and financial support to provide volunteers with the</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L12222" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="12222"></td>
          <td id="LC12222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assistance they need are critical to reaching Project Gutenberg-tm&#39;s</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L12223" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="12223"></td>
          <td id="LC12223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">goals and ensuring that the Project Gutenberg-tm collection will</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L12224" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="12224"></td>
          <td id="LC12224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remain freely available for generations to come. In 2001, the Project</td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td id="L12225" class="blob-num js-line-number js-code-nav-line-number js-blob-rnum" data-line-number="12225"></td>
          <td id="LC12225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Gutenberg Literary Archive Foundation was created to provide a secure</td>
        </tr>
